debounce-config-apikey: Description of the configuration variable $wgDebounceApiKey. This message is not exposed to users.
debounce-config-free: Description of the configuration variable $wgDebounceFree. This message is not exposed to users.
debounce-config-private: Description of the configuration variable $wgDebouncePrivate. This message is not exposed to users.
debounce-unconfigured: Error message displayed when the extension has not yet been configured. This message is only exposed to users if the system administrator has configured $wgShowExceptionDetails = true.
